name: List
description:
*SOUND IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME SUCCESSFULLY*

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • Left Click/CTRL - Pickup/Place
  • Tab - Toggle Shopping List
  • O - Toggle Options Menu

DESCRIPTION

List is a first person 3D puzzle game. In List, you have 5 minutes to locate all of the items on a list provided to you by your mother before she abandons you at the grocery store! This is easier said than done, however, as gathering every item is not as straight-forward as you might think. List was built from the ground up by a core team of five individuals using many different programs including Unity, Maya, Blender, Photoshop, and Sibelius.

CREDITS

Dylan Avendano: 3D Modeler, Texture Artist, Story Concept (Maya)
Austin Hare: 3D Artist, Game Design, Project Manager (Blender)
Janine Ibrahim: Graphic Design and Image Textures
Kettako: Music and Sound Design (Sibelius/Ableton)
Richard Pittman: Programmer and Unity Dev, Game Design

Special Thanks:

Joel Pringle: Voiceover
Julian Mason: Likeness
